comments: When you record a test going to google, and put in any name, then generate the test and execute the test, the test fails and  a NumberFormatException is thrown.

Created an attachment (id=35617)
Recording file that shows error when generated and executed

Created an attachment (id=35618)
recmodel file that yields error.

Using build TPTP-4.2.0-200603020100, copy these two files into workspace.  From Navigator (not Test Navigator), Right-click and select 'Generate Test'.  When this has completed, select the test1.testsuite from the Test Navigator and select 'Generate'.  Then right-click on testsuite again and select 'Run As->Test'.  You will see the NumberFormatException when you view the Test Log (execution history).  I was using the RAC (not the IAC).

More information  -  when I close eclipse, then bring it back up (using eclipse -consolelog to create a console log window) and execute the test again, I see a different error.  The test is marked with a verdict of 'inconclusive' since we don't get all the stop events (previously was marked with 'error' verdict), and the following error shows up in the console log window 7 times:
